formalpara.title: Internal help for this AGI command in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Usage: CHANNEL STATUS [<channelname>] Returns the status of the specified channel. If no channel name is given the returns the status of the current channel. Return values: 0 Channel is down and available 1 Channel is down, but reserved 2 Channel is off hook 3 Digits (or equivalent) have been dialed 4 Line is ringing 5 Remote end is ringing 6 Line is up 7 Line is busy

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:
Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -10,3 +10,4 @@ 5 Remote end is ringing 6 Line is up 7 Line is busy + Runs Dead : No
